thread.title: Big week ahead for Southern Regional
thread.title_full: Big week ahead for Southern Regional | www.ajc.com

author: Tammy Joyner
title: Big week ahead for Southern Regional
text:
This is a big week coming up for Southern Regional Medical Center, the financially-beleaguered hospital in Riverdale.
It has two suitors eager to hook up with the hospital, which filed for reorganization under the bankruptcy laws in July. A couple of bankruptcy proceedings this week could translate to Southern Regional having a new owner and a new direction for the 331-bed facility. For more on Southern Regionalâ€™s path to recovery read here .
